resources.string: <font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font> waved. To wave back, aim at them and press [{keybind}].
Wave not returned. <font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font> might remember that.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your Company invites?
Delete all of your Company invites.
Delete {rankName} rank?\nMembers with this rank will be moved to the {newRankName} rank.
<font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font> wants to be friends with you. Press 'Esc' to open the social menu.
You are now friends with <font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font>.
You rejected the friend request from {playerName}.
Must be in faction to create company.

Companies are groups of players to band together with to enhance your online experience. Fight alongside your friends against the Corrupted and siege opposing Faction territories. Join or start your own with friends!
The Company you create will be aligned with the Faction you've selected. You can invite other players to your Company who are also within the same faction.

Only Companies can declare war and siege Territories to take them over. As Governor of a Territory, your Company earns coin through taxes, gets huge discounts on fast travel, and contributes to the success of your whole Faction.
Communicate and group up easily with company members, see when members were last online, get access to a shared amount of Coin in the Company Treasury.
Company creation failed, already in a company.
Company creation failed, you cannot create more than one company every 24 hours.
Company creation failed, you are not in a faction.
To create a Company, invite another player.
<font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{playerName}</font> has invited you to join <font color="#ffd45f" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{guildName}</font>.
You invited <font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font> to join your Company.
You must appoint another {guildMasterRankName} in order to join another Company.
You cannot join another Company while commanding a warring Company with only one member.
Unable to invite to Company. Your Company is full.
Unable to send invite. The recipient already has an invite from this Company.
Unable to accept an invite from {guildName}. The Company is full.
Unable to accept an invite from {guildName}. The Company no longer exists.
Unable to accept an invite from {guildName}. You are not in the Company's Faction.
You recently left {guildName}. You must wait {timeRemaining} before you can rejoin this Company.
You recently left a Company and cannot join {guildName}. You must wait {timeRemaining} before you can join a new Company.
The Company name has changed to <font color="#9e947e">{guildName}</font>.
The name '{guildName}' is already in use.
Company Message of the Day Here
Company ownership has been transferred to <font color="#9e947e">{playerName}</font>.
Cannot change rank of {playerName}, as there are no other Consuls to take their place.
You do not have permissions to deposit.
You do not have permissions to withdraw.
You have reached your daily limit.
You do not have permissions to change the daily withdrawal limit.
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was deposited to the company treasury.
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was deposited to the company treasury (capped by Treasury maximum).
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was deposited to the company treasury (capped by personal funds).
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was withdrawn from the company treasury.
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was withdrawn from the company treasury (capped by lack of funds).
<font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage} was withdrawn from the company treasury (capped by daily limit).
Daily withdrawal limit is set to <font color={colorHex}>{amount}</font> {coinImage}.
Daily withdrawal limit is set to {infinityImage}.

<font color="#ffffff">If your company owns a territory,</font> If someone declares a war, your claimâ€™s protection will go down
automatically in this time window.

Make sure to defend your claim from the attackers during this time.
The selected siege window is the same as your company's current window.
The selected siege window overlaps with maintenance time window between {maintWindow}.
Your rank ({rankName}) does not have permission to set the siege window.
The siege window cannot be changed when a war is active.
You cannot change the siege window again for {timeRemaining}.
No need to set a siege window.

Are you sure you want to set the siege window to <font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">{siegeWindow}</font></font>?\nYou will not be allowed to change it again for <font color="#cf0000"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">{cooldownTime}.</font></font>
This company is at war against 1 company.
This company is at war against {number} companies.
This company is no longer at war.
Unable to send Company invites. Insufficient rank.
Unable to send Company invites. Not in a Faction.
Your Company rank ({rank}) is not high enough.

string.comment: timeType refers to seconds, minutes, hours, days, etc.
This appears in the company screen's invites list

resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove {playerName} from the Company?
Are you sure you want to leave the Company?
Are you sure you want to leave the Company?\n\nAnother member will be promoted to Governor when you leave, and any holdings the company has will remain with the company under the new governor.
Are you sure you want to leave the Company?\n\nYou are the only member and when you leave, any holdings the company has will be lost.
View or make changes to your Company.
Your Company's Governor has been away for a long time. A member with 'Consul' rank may become Governor.
Your Company's Governor has left or deleted their character. A member with 'Consul' rank may become Governor.
{allowed} promote members up to one rank below current rank

string.comment: MOTD stands for Message of the Day

resources.string: {allowed} declare wars and set the siege window
{allowed} withdraw up to daily limit from Company Treasury
{allowed} withdraw any amount from Company Treasury
{allowed} set the daily Treasury withdrawal limit
{allowed} build and replace in a Company Fort
{playerName} is already a member of your Company.

Are you sure you want to transfer Company Governorship to {memberName}?

All members, claims, structures and treasury funds of {guildName} will fall under the control of {memberName} as the new Governor of {guildName}. The Company Name and Crest will remain the same. You will be demoted one rank.

You cannot undo this action, and the change will be effective immediately.

string.comment: The name for currency is Coin
The name for currency is Coin

resources.string: Coin can be sent to any online player.

string.comment: This will appear with the time remaining in a separate text field
This will appear with the time remaining in a separate text field
This will appear with the time remaining in a separate text field
This will appear with the time remaining in a separate text field

resources.string: Counter Attack {cost} {coinImage}\n<font color="#b45353"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">Available in resolution phase in\n{timeRemaining}</font></font>
Defender can <font color="#b45353">counter attack</font> in\n<font color="#b45353">{timeRemaining}</font>
Counter attack has already been used.

During a war, both companies can attack each other without becoming criminals. During the defending company's Siege Window, the attacking company can attack their structures even if their territory is protected.

string.comment: When presented to the user, the name for currency is always Coin
This will have a time below it for how long the war will last after the extension

resources.string: Are you sure you want to counter attack {guildName}?\nBoth Companies will be able to attack each other without being flagged as a criminal for:
\nYour rank ({rank}) does not have permission to declare war or counter attack.
\nYour Company permissions allow you to declare war and counter attack.
This Company has no territory to war over.
The target company's siege window has changed. Please retry.
The cost to declare war has changed. Please retry.
The cost to declare war and the siege window have changed. Please retry.
Your company can get <font color={colorHex}>counter attacked</font> once a war is declared (in Resolution).

Keep in mind that the <font color={defendingColorHex}>defending company can re-declare a war</font>
by initiating a <font color={counterAttackColor}>counter attack</font> in <font color={resolutionPhaseColor}>Resolution phase</font>.

If a counter attack is initiated, the <font color={situationReversedColor}>situation will be reversed</font>.
Your company will have to defend your claim, and the enemy will attack!

When a war is declared, your company can attack the fortress for 30 minutes with up to 50 players.\nWhen your company successfully takes down the claim marker in the fortress, your company becomes the governor of the territory.
You can only attack the territory in the designated siege time window.\nReview the siege window below.
A war camp is placed near the fortress.\nYour company will be able to use the camp when the war starts!
Your war declaration is pending!\nYou will be notified shortly if it was successful or not.
Another company's war declaration was selected. Your coin has been refunded to the Company Wallet.
Your upcoming war is scheduled. Head to the territory's war board to sign up and manage your army.
Company Territory Taxes are due for {name}!

string.comment: When presented to the user, the name for currency is always Coin

resources.string: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Your company is not at war.</font> \n\n To declare war on a territory, open the Map and click on its Settlement icon.

<font color={phaseColorHex}><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">PRE-WAR PHASE</font></font>\n\nAll fighters must sign up at the War Board in the territory, and the governor must assign them into the 50 available slots.
<font color={phaseColorHex}><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">BATTLE PHASE</font></font>\n\nThis phase has been deprecated and should not appear.

<font color={phaseColorHex}><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">RESOLUTION PHASE</font></font>\n\nWar wrap-up. Review the war results, and all fighters will be teleported to the territory's Settlement.

<font color={phaseColorHex}><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">SIEGE WINDOW</font></font>\n\nInvites go out to the army 15 minutes before the war, and all will be teleported to the Fort. The winner takes the territory.
Your Company is currently at war with {guildName}. Time remaining: {timeRemaining}
You have <font color={colorHex}>{numHours} hours</font> left to do so.

The cost of war will increase if:

The number of members in each Company is significantly different.

The number of wars the other Company is in.

The number of wars your Company is in.

How many times this war has been re-declared.
You do not have permissions to withdraw from this structure
You do not have permissions to deposit into this structure
The item cannot be transferred because of max space and weight restrictions.
You do not have enough funds to cover the withdrawal fee for remotely stored items.
Withdrawing requires both territories to be in your faction and be current on their upkeep.
You can only deposit items to the storage shed at your current location.
Are you sure you want to join a new company?

Any Territories you own won't be transferred to the new Company, and will continue to be claimed by the Company you're leaving. Companies must go through the War Declaration process to claim any of those Territories.

Are you sure you want to leave your current Company and join a new Company?\nYou will not be able to rejoin this Company for {rejoinTime} and you will not be able to join a new Company for {switchTime}.
Are you sure you want to leave your current Company and join a new Company?
Cannot transfer Company leadership while at war
You don't have permission to promote members to your rank or above
You don't have permission to promote members
You don't have permission to demote members at or above your rank
You don't have permission to demote members
You don't have permission to kick members at or above your rank
You don't have permission to kick members
You can't leave your own Company. Promote another member to Governor first.
You don't have permission to invite new members
You are not in a company, you must create or join a company first.

You don't have enough coin ({cost} {coinImage}).

*Cost increases are based on differences in Company member count, previous counter attacks, and number of wars Company is currently in.

Can afford war.

*Cost increases are based on differences in Company member count, previous counter attacks, and number of wars Company is currently in.
Opposing Company will narrow this time down to a {time} hour period after war is declared.

Set a proposed {conquestWindow} hour window for the Siege window. Once set and confirmed, War will be officially declared.\n\nThe Opposing Company will have until the start of the Battle phase to narrow the proposed Siege window to a {conquestTime} hour period. Siege starts at the beginning of the proposed time if none is set.

Set a {conquestTime} hour period for the Siege window. You must choose this time within the {conquestWindow} hour window set by the attacking Company.\n\nIf you do not set this before the start of the battle phase, the time will be set at the beginning of the window chosen by the attacking Company.

Your company name has been flagged as inappropriate. We have assigned a temporary name that can be changed at any time. Code of Conduct: View Code of Conduct If you believe you have received this penalty in error, you may appeal it by visiting: Appeal Decision Would you like to update your company name now?

You will be helping the attacking company to take this territory.\nAttackers will be playing from <font color="#ffffff">The War Camp</font>, and the objective is to capture the claim point in the fort.

You will be helping the defending company to keep the territory.\nDefenders will be playing from <font color="#ffffff">inside of the fort</font>, and the objective is to protect the claim point from being captured.

The corrupted army will attack <font color="#ffffff">Fort {territoryName}</font> to take over the territory and destroy the settlement.\nFight for the territory, Protect the settlement, Be part of the great battle and Get rewards!
The corrupted army will attack <font color="#ffffff">Fort {territoryName}</font> to take over the territory and destroy the settlement.
We will notify you if you are selected to be in the war as soon as possible.
You will receive a notification 5 minutes before the invasion.
No war to sign up for.
You cannot sign up to fight against your own company.
You cannot sign up to fight against your own faction.
The signup list for this war is full.
You are already signed up for a war that is scheduled around the same time.
You have to be at a war board to sign up.
You have to join a faction before you can participate in war.
You need to be at least level {minLevel} to sign up.
You have been removed from the roster by the governing company and cannot rejoin their army.
There was a problem signing up for this war.
You are already signed up for a war that is scheduled around the same time.\nDo you want to abandon your registration in {territoryName}?
Are you sure you want to abandon your registration for this war?
Are you sure you want to abandon this war (any spent tokens or items will be lost)?
Are you sure you want to abandon the war and accept this group invitation?\nYou will be teleported out of the war area and any spent tokens or items will be lost.
You don't have permission to manage the army.
Couldn't move one of the selected players, please try again.
No more manual selections allowed, please remove a player first.
Cannot move a player with a pending invitation.
There was a problem modifying the roster.
You don't have permission to change the backfill state.
Backfill state cannot be changed for invasions
There was a problem changing the backfill state.
Company governor and consuls can withdraw any amount of coin from the treasury. Officers can withdraw up to the daily limit set by the governor.
The coins spent to declare war will be refunded if your Company is not selected.
Territory needs to be in conflict.
Other companies can declare war as well, the warring company will be randomly selected.

string.comment: text to show when a company name would be present but the player isn't in one
text to show when a faction name would be present but the player isn't in one

resources.string: You cannot sign up for your faction's opponent.
You must have a faction to sign up for a war.
<font color="#ff6363">Player level {level}</font> <font color="#c0c0c0"> is required to sign up.</font>
You will be notified in game if you are selected by the company.
10 players will be selected by the company, 40 players will be randomly selected at the time of Invasion.

If you are selected, Be online by <font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">{time}, {date}</font></font>. If you are not online by this time, <font color="#ffffff">you will lose your spot</font>.\nYou will be teleported to the fort when it starts, so you donâ€™t need to be physically in the fort!

Be online by <font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">{time}, {date}</font></font>. 40 players will be randomly selected at that time.\nIf you are not online by this time, you won't get a spot!
Even if you are not selected by the time of war, Donâ€™t worry. You might have a chance to back-fill during the war,\nif you stay online during the war.
Even if you are not selected by the time of Invasion, Donâ€™t worry. You might have a chance to back-fill during the invasion,\nif you stay online during the invasion.
Attackers must take all 3 control points before the gates can be damaged. Once they are taken they are Respawn points and access to Armory.

Once all 3 control points are taken, attackers can try to knock down gates and <font color="#ffffff">take the control point in the fort.</font> If attackers succeed they will win the war, if attackers fail to claim it, defenders will win the war.
As the war goes on, there will be longer and longer Respawn waves. When soldiers are killed, they will Respawn in the next Respawn wave.
Players earn battle tokens by damaging their enemies. With Battle tokens, players can purchase various items from Armory.
The corrupted enemies will attack the fort in waves, with each successive wave becoming stronger.
The corrupted army will try to knock down the gates and take a control point within the fort. If players successfully defend the claim point from invasion, they will win.
<font color="#ffe294">Player level {level}</font> is required to participate in an invasion.
Invitations will be sent at\n<font color="#ffdd85"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{time}</font></font>
